howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.subtitle: From sensors to cloud: understanding your environmental monitoring station

step1.title: Data Collection
step1.description: M5Stack CoreS3 reads sensor data: temperature, humidity, pressure, and particulate matter concentrations.

step2.title: Secure Transmission
step2.description: Data sent via Wi-Fi to Node-RED backend API using secure HTTP POST requests with API key authentication.

step3.title: Cloud Storage
step3.description: PostgreSQL database stores all environmental data for long-term historical tracking and analysis.

step4.title: Visualization
step4.description: Data dashboards provide real-time monitoring, trend analysis, and educational data exploration tools.
